trends: There has been one other sighting in Shadyside
There were no other sightings in Shadyside on or around November 30th 2002
divs: sighting detailsi was letting off fireworks on a hill above the town of shadyside, ohio on july 10th 2010, with my two grandsons. appx. 10:30 pm a very bright silver\white light moved slowly from west to east. it was about the size of a dime held at arms length. it took about 30 seconds to travel 3\4s the way across the sky at which point it stopped. it remained stationary for a few seconds then blinked out. several weeks before this my wife and i were setting on the porch, around 7:00pm we saw two silver\white round objects moving from east to west at about the same speed as the july 10th incident. i was curious and my grandsons were in awe and very excited.
